main event: A glowing white circular object, possibly Venus, was observed on the horizon in North Dakota.
interesting points: The object was reported to be visible for 15-20 minutes., The sighting occurred in the direction of the northeast and disappeared to the northwest., The observation was documented in a Project Blue Book record card., It was mentioned that the sighting was possibly from both civilian and military perspectives., The sighting was also reported by the Chief of Police in Tioga, North Dakota.
location: Spring Brook and Tioga, North Dakota
witness description: a farmer and the Chief of Police, Tioga, North Dakota
